summary: The true story of Ivan Sanchin, the KGB officer who was Stalin's private film projectionist from 1939 until the dictator's death. Told from Sanchin's view, the sympathetic but tragically ... See full summary »
cast: Tom Hulce|Lolita Davidovich|Bob Hoskins|Aleksandr Zbruev|Feodor Chaliapin Jr.|Bess Meyer|Mariya Baranova|Irina Kupchenko|Vladimir Kuleshov|Vsevolod Larionov|Aleksandr Filippenko|Evdokiya Germanova|Lyubov Matyushina|Aleksandr Garin|Mariya Vinogradova|Aleksandr Lipkov|Antonina Anokhina|Aleksandr Sirin|Oleg Tabakov|Mikhail Kononov|Aleksandr Feklistov|Vladimir Steklov|Elena Borzunova|Irina Lazareva|Vira Yefraimova|Ilya Chanbudanov|Viktor Balabanov|Viktor Uralskiy|Valentin Cheryakov|Victor Tardian|Ivan Teplov|Ivanova Petrova|Aleksandr Pashutin|Sergey Artsibashev|Olga Volkova
title: El círculo del poder
